TopicTitle: Fuel lines dont drain properly for my SSTO

Articles.Content:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=175636020

My fuel get drained from the front tank and the right one and after that the left one get drained.

I want the front tank first darined THEN the left and right, these 2 at the same time not right then left.

I use 3 liquid fuel tanks for my 1 liquid fuel tank . 1 jet fuel tank for my 2 jet engines. The decoupler and docking port stop fuel flowing to wrong engines.

what can i do to make this work?
